entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Flurries beginning in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
